projects.name: electro-world-checkout
projects.description: In this repository, you can see a simple website that calculates the total price of a shopping cart, getting data from a JSON file, and using different components passing the data by props. The code is written in Javascript.

projects.name: gato
projects.description: Simple code that calls an extern API to get the data with images, that then shows a grid. The user can show more details in a modal and apply a filter using the Debounce technique. The code is written in React and Javascript.

projects.name: pangram
projects.description: This simple code, checks if a string is a pangram or not. A pangram is a sentence that contains all the letters of the alphabet at least once. For example, the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The code is written in Javascript.
